availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, attorney and judge of the Equity and Criminal Court. Simpson County, Kentucky native. Married to Frances N. Stephens Bigger. Judge of the Equity and Criminal Court in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, District 2, p. 134.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Fulton County, 1846.
Z. F. Smith The History of Kentucky (Louisville: The Courier-Journal Job Printing Company, 1892), 789.
